segments.text: I can't believe how focused the woman is on that plate, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring out water, creating such a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot is already in the water, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on, with the water just cascading down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating such a mess, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children in the background, completely oblivious to the water hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be more interested in the cookie jar, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy watching the children, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be having fun, even if they are being a bit sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and notices the water soon, before someone slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
